name: selfsave
source:
ecode = document.querySelector('.CodeMirror-code')
ecode.style.fontSize = '17.5px'; // 13px
fp = 'file:///Users/rainerg/ajr/Aspirin/node_modules/cson/docs/index.html';

Object.keys(fs)
Object.keys(windowManager.windows)

source = editor.getValue();
hash = md5(source)

remote.app.db.insert({name:'selfsave',md5:hash,source:source})

justShowResult('-')
cb = cw.getBounds()
justShowResult(`x=${cb.x} y=${cb.y} width=${cb.width} height=${cb.height} `)
